title: Font ID Help
content:
Hi All,

Would very much appreciate your help in IDing this font.

Sample clearly reads; "We Carry Your Oxygen". Thanks in advance.

O

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417194736/http:/typophile.com/files/Font2_3.jpg) | 35.41 KB |
author: obasom

comments.content:
It must be **[Quixley](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417194736/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset&ffam=Quixley%20LET%20-%20Plain&fid=5af5d7148f45dd6b69a69c2c987a38f2&fsize=60&text=We%20Carry%20Your%20Oxygen&fit=1)** by Vince Whitlock (Letraset, 1991) also available from Linotype & ITC

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417194736/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
It's very close to it yes. Thank you very much for the help.
